# alicloud\_dns\_domain\_txt\_guid

Provides the generation of txt records to realize the retrieval and verification of domain names.

-> **NOTE:** Available in v1.80.0+.

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as constructs from "constructs";
import * as cdktf from "cdktf";
/*Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.*/
import * as alicloud from "./.gen/providers/alicloud";
class MyConvertedCode extends cdktf.TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: constructs.Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    const dataAlicloudDnsDomainTxtGuidThis =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudDnsDomainTxtGuid.DataAlicloudDnsDomainTxtGuid(
        this,
        "this",
        {
          domainName: "test111.abc",
          type: "ADD_SUB_DOMAIN",
        }
      );
    new cdktf.TerraformOutput(this, "rr", {
      value: dataAlicloudDnsDomainTxtGuidThis.rr,
    });
    new cdktf.TerraformOutput(this, "value", {
      value: dataAlicloudDnsDomainTxtGuidThis.value,
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `domainName` - (Required) Verified domain name.
* `type` - (Required) Txt verification function. Value:`addSubDomain`, `retrieval`.
* `lang` - (Optional) User language.
* `outputFile` - (Optional) File name where to save data source results (after running `terraform plan`).

## Attributes Reference

The following attributes are exported in addition to the arguments listed above:

* `rr` - Host record.
* `value` - Record the value.
